dialogueTree.enemyPhrase: You dare intrude upon my domain, mortal? Kneel before the Wight King or face annihilation!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I kneel to no one, Morghul. Prepare to fall like the rest.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Foolish arrogance! Your bones will join my legion, twisted and lost for eternity.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your legion of bones will be dust by the time I’m through.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then face your end, weakling! I shall relish your destruction.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Bring it on, King of the Dead!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your defiance will be your undoing. Prepare for death!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: You will see the true power of an Infernal Tiefling!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: We'll see who truly commands power. Draw your weapon!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I have faced worse; you’re nothing special.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your insolence only deepens your grave. Ready yourself for combat!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then let us settle this once and for all.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: With pleasure. Your demise awaits!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The shadows shall consume you, wraith.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: The shadows serve me, fool. Prepare for battle.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Enough words. Let’s fight.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: So be it. Your end draws near!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Prepare to be vanquished!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Such bold words from a doomed soul. Let’s see you back them up.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your time is up, Morghul.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your time is slipping away. Prepare to die.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: What right do you have to rule, Wight King? The Darkened Veil is mine to claim.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: My rule is absolute, enforced by the unyielding grip of death. Challenge it at your peril.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your deathly grip cannot hold me.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: You’ll find it quite unforgiving. Presume your defense, if you dare!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then let the mightiest stand victorious.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Agreed. Only the strongest will leave alive.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: The dead should stay buried; I shall bury you again.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Try if you must, but you shall fail. Prepare for your second death.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I will prove your rule is a sham.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Many have tried, and all have failed. You’ll be no different!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Your failure adds to my triumph. Let's fight.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: A fight you will regret. En garde!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Only if they were weak. I am not.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Weakness or strength, it matters not. Prepare yourself.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Do you think an eternal throne makes you unchallengeable? Think again.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Eternity has polished my dominance. Your challenge is feeble.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I shall break your dominance. Now!
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then let’s conclude this farce in combat!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I accept your challenge. Let's settle this.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: As you wish. Your fate is sealed.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I am Zarathos, the Shadow Conqueror. We don't have to be enemies.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Zarathos, conqueror or not, my trust is not given lightly.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Together, we could eclipse the light forever.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: An enticing proposal, yet untrustworthy nonetheless. Prove your worth!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Only a fool needs proof. Trust or fall.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your arrogance speaks louder than your words. I choose to ignore you.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then let my deeds speak. Lead the way.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Actions may speak louder. We shall see.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: We can combine our strengths to dominate the Darkened Veil.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Strength is appealing, but loyalty is rare. Why should I trust you?

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Because, together, none can stand against us.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Your words hold merit. An alliance it is.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Trust is for the weak. We can use each other.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Then let us not waste further words. Allying with you it is!

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Trust in profit. You will gain more ruling by my side.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Profit does not motivate the dead. Leave or face the consequences.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: Then face me, and see the error in your decision.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Be gone from my sight. I shall ignore your foolish challenge.

playerCharacterAnswers.playerOption: I see you are beyond reason. Farewell.
playerCharacterAnswers.enemyAnswer: Indeed. Depart from my domain.
